headline.main: ITALY ADMITS LOSS OF FIVE WARSHIPS; Bad News of Heavy Damage to Once Proud Navy Broken to People Officially

lead_paragraph: ROME, March 31 -- The admission that three cruisers and two destroyers were lost in a naval battle in the Ionian Sea on Friday was made in today's Italian war bulletin, but it is asserted that the British losses were also very serious.
abstract: Itals admit loss of 3 cruisers and 2 destroyers; claim 3 Brit ships sunk; deny cruiser Giovanni delle Bande Nere sinking

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
